_sText:
##### Please visit my blog to know what I am doing! It's in Polish language! [>>Masogs blog<<](http://masog.wordpress.com "")

**IT'S A LAST UPDATE!! EVERYTHING SHOULD WORK NOW SO I AM NOT GOING TO CHANGE ANYTHING BECAUSE THIS MAP IS ONLY SMALL PROJECT.**

@v2 - Removed Ladders, added planks. (gravity bug..)

@V1 - Fixed gravity bug.

On this map I am using my Skills-System. I did it for Kirby and he'll propably use it in mg_mario_battle.

I like this Skills-System so i did a small map with it.

I created this map in about 9 hours.. It looks good and I think everything works good too! You have only a knife on this map.

About:

You are a Ninja! Yes you are! On spawn you can choose your skill and after 30 seconds everybody'll be teleported to an arena.

**Classes:**

Running Ninja.

- Fast (80 hp)
- Very Fast (60 hp)
- Fast Like Hell (15 hp)

Shy Ninja.

- Gravity - (80 hp)
- Gravity - - (60 hp)
- Gravity - - - (15 hp)

Fat Ninja.

- Slow (135 hp)
- Very Slow (200 hp)

Nudist Ninja.

- Stealth + (80 hp)
- Stealth + + (60 hp)

Junior Ninja.

- Normal (100 hp)

Enjoy!
